post:
UnixGuru OpenVZ VPS Prices

VPSs are comprised of "Nodes" each node has the following resources

1 Node: Costs £5

Physical RAM: 896M
VSWAP (RAM): 128MB
SSD DISK: 10GB
NIC: 10Mb/s (Unmetered)

+ £1.99 for the IP and Control Panel and a £4.99 setup

So the above VPS would cost £6.99 a month and £4.99 Setup for the first month
If you purchase annually you get 12 months for the price of 10 and the setup fee is waived.

Additional IPs are £0.99 a month with a £4.99 setup (again £9.99 for the year, setup waived)


Examples configs:

"4G" VPS (4 nodes of power) £21.99
3584MB RAM, 512MB VSWAP, 40GB SSD, BW 40 Mb/s (Unmetered)

"8G" VPS £41.99

"16G" VPS £81.99
160Mb/s (Unmetered)

1G to 24G plans are available for purchase.


CentOS, Fedora, Debian & Ubuntu OSes available.

20% Off your first year with code
